mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RIOT_MATCH_RAW (match_id, match_data, region, saved_at) VALUES (#{matchId}, #{matchData}, #{region}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE match_data = #{matchData}, region = #{region}, saved_at = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT id, match_id as matchId, match_data as matchData, region, saved_at as savedAt FROM RIOT_MATCH_RAW WHERE match_id = #{matchId}
